name: Warehouse Madness (PPgames)
description:
Congratulations on your job as a warehouse keeper! Don't mind the weird tasks and don't ask too much questions. 

Currently in stock:

  • relaxing labyrinth puzzle game
  • nostalgic pixel grafics
  • enjoyable movement mechanics
  • original music

Compete with your friends for more fun!

Update: fixed a crucial bug, reuploaded a game file.
